result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Received and Filed: Attorney Fred Richardson
Upon request from the State Public Defender's Office, Court RESCHEDULED status conference to November 21, 2022 at 1:30 PM.  Parties notified of court date.  Case adjourned to Branch 2, Rm 635 CH.

Defendant Deonta L Champion in court.  Attorney James C Griffin in court for State of Wisconsin. 

Case in court for a status of counsel.  No attorney appointed.  Court finds good cause to allow the State Public Defender's Office to continue to look for an attorney to appoint.  Court advises Mr. Champion to continue to cooperate with Justice Point.  Court scheduled another status of counsel hearing.  SPD's Office notified of next court date.  Case adjourned to Branch 2, Rm 635 CH.
Status conference scheduled for November 23, 2023 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Deonta L Champion in court.  Prosecuting attorney James C Griffin in court for the State of Wisconsin. Status conference held. SPD has not yet appointed. Court adjourns case in Branch 02.
Status conference scheduled for October 17, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Received and Filed.

Defendant Deonta L Champion in court with attorney Brett Lee Copeland.  Amanda Korin Kirklewski appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Defendant appears via Zoom.  Defense motion to withdraw as counsel is granted by the court. Defense counsel will notify Public Defender's Office to appoint new counsel for the defendant. Case adjourned for status of counsel hearing by Zoom.  Status conference scheduled for September 13, 2022 at 08:30 am.

22RM017092  Actual Date Bond Posted with *sheriff 03-30-2022

Attorney Brett Lee Copeland in court, defendant Deonta L Champion not in court, in custody.  James C Griffin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Hearing held via Zoom. Defense requests a status conference date. Case adjourned, Branch 2 via Zoom.  Status conference scheduled for April 26, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Bail motion by defense argued and denied by the Court.

Defendant Deonta L Champion in court with Attorney Brett Lee Copeland.  Defendant Deonta L Champion in custody.  Jennifer Tate appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  PARTIES APPEAR BY VIDEO.
Court took judicial notice of 18CF5473. Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the State: MPD Detective J. Sullivan.  State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and plead not guilty.  Case is adjourned to Branch 02.  Scheduling conference scheduled for March 21, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant's Notice of Motion and Motion to Modify Bond, filed

Defendant Deonta L Champion not in court, defendant in custody.  Matthew Zisi appeared for the State of Wisconsin. PARTIES APPEAR BY VIDEO. 
Case in court for a Preliminary Hearing. State's witness is present. SPD need more time to appoint counsel. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 1, 2022 at 08:30 am.
No Contact Order signed and filed.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with Wongs Wok (242 E. Capitol Drive, Milwaukee) or any of its employees; SH (dob 3/24/2002) or her mother, LT (dob 6/8/1982); AG (dob 10/16/1998).  Court advised defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Deonta L Champion in court with attorney Kylie Kaltenberg.  Defendant Deonta L Champion in custody.  Jessica Ann Behling appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deonta L Champion appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Childs, Branch 02.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for January 31, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
